content: inspired by the cheerful daisy this delicate beanie adds a floral touch to any ensemble crocheted in rounds this piece offers a comfy fit while gently taming your tresses get playful with vibrant hues and use multiple yarn colors or add a pop of style by crocheting a contrasting color border *pattern can be downloaded either after signing up for the company s mailing list or by proceeding directly to download underneath the signup button *
